title: An Encounter with Wolf

title: The Grandmother’s Deception
plot_change_note: The dialogue depicts a longer, more probing interaction between Red and the impostor, with Red voicing suspicions, resisting physical proximity, and actively seeking confirmation of Grandmother’s identity. Red does not feign a cough or immediately scan the impostor but instead uses conversation and logic to test the impostor before planning her escape. The plot is updated to reflect a more gradual escalation of suspicion and tension, with Red’s internal monologue and tactical planning shown in her spoken lines, rather than covert scanning. Wolf’s reveal is delayed until after Red’s suspicions peak and she begins to act on her doubts.
